title: Bieber on dad’s awkward penis post
text: Justin Bieber on dad, Jeremy Bieber’s awkward penis post Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Justin Bieber on dad, Jeremy Bieber’s awkward penis post Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Hilarious ... Justin Bieber has defended his dad’s tweet boasting about the size of his penis. Picture: AP JUSTIN Bieber has responded to his dad’s awkward tweet boasting about the size of his son’s penis. Paparazzi snapped naked pictures of the Boyfriend singer while on holiday in Bora Bora, which then went viral. Proud ... Jeremy Bieber and his son, Justin. Picture: Supplied Jeremy Bieber decided it was a good chance to let the world know about his pride regarding hsi son’s manhood. “@justinbieber what do you feed that thing. #proud daddy (sic),” he wrote. Bieber told the Zach Sang & The Gang show that he thought the tweet was “hilarious.” Justin Bieber - Part 1 Justin Bieber - Part 2 “It’s such a dad thing to say,” he said. When I found out people were hating on him for saying that, I was like, “Are you kidding me? What dad wouldn’t be proud of that? It’s not like he’s saying it to an 11-year-old. I’m 21 years old.” Other Stories
